oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tandy Rice Interviewed by Bob Allen in 1978 Side Two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Bob Allen interviewing Tandy Rice. The recording takes place on 8-18-78.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tandy Rice
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side Two - (0:13) -- Tandy Rice describes his daily mail that he receives at Top Billing. (1:03) -- Tandy Rice describes words of praise from fans of his work. (3:11) -- Tandy Rice describes the success of Tammy Wynette on television. (4:00) -- Tandy Rice describes his future endeavors in commercial advertising. (6:36) -- Tandy Rice speaks on artists signing to agents/managers. (7:52) -- Bob Allen asks Tandy Rice about managing Wendy Holcombe. (8:51) -- Tandy Rice speaks about Jim Halsey. (10:12) -- Bob Allen asks Tandy Rice about his newer artists (Wendy Holcombe & Jim Ed Brown). (11:00) -- Tandy Rice speaks about his work for Jim Ed Brown. (12:28) -- Tandy Rice speaks about a videotape presentation of Jim Ed Brown. (13:45) -- Tandy Rice speaks on a television segment in construction at Top Billing for Tom T. Tall & Chevrolet.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rice, Tandy;
